name: Attack
description: Allows players to wield stronger melee weapons and fight more accurately in Melee.

name: Strength
description: Allows players to deal more melee damage and equip certain weapons. It also gives access to several agility shortcuts.

name: Defence
description: Allows players to wear stronger armour and decrease chance of being hit (does not reduce damage dealt, as is a common misconception).

name: Ranged
description: Allows players to fight with missiles and projectiles from a distance.

name: Prayer
description: Allows players to pray for assistance, such as ability boosts.

name: Magic
description: Allows players to cast spells and teleportation.

name: Runecrafting
description: Allows players to make runes for Magic.

name: Construction
description: Allows players to build a house.

name: Hitpoints
description: Allows players to sustain more damage.

name: Agility
description: Allows players to use shortcuts and increases the rate at which energy recharges.

name: Herblore
description: Allows players to make potions.

name: Thieving
description: Allows players to steal from market stalls and chests and pickpocket non-player characters.

name: Crafting
description: Allows players to create items, from pottery to ranged armour.

name: Fletching
description: Allows players to create projectiles (arrows, bolts) and bows which can be used for Ranged.

name: Slayer
description: Allows players to kill certain monsters that can't normally be defeated.

name: Hunter
description: Allows players to hunt and catch animals through various methods.

name: Mining
description: Allows players to obtain ores from rocks.

name: Smithing
description: Allows players to smelt ores into bars and smith bars into armour and weapons.

name: Fishing
description: Allows players to catch fish.

name: Cooking
description: Allows players to cook food. The food can then be eaten to heal players' Hitpoints.

name: Firemaking
description: Allows players to make fires

name: Woodcutting
description: Allows players to cut down trees to obtain logs.

name: Farming
description: Allows players to grow plants (fruits, vegetables, herbs, trees, etc.).
